name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior MES Engineer with 9+ years of experience in designing and implementing Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES) solutions. Proficient in leveraging tools and technologies like **Opcenter**, **PharmaSuite**, and **Camstar** to enhance manufacturing processes and ensure compliance with FDA and GMP standards. Highly skilled in project management and team collaboration, demonstrating exceptional communication and teamwork skills to lead cross-functional initiatives effectively. Additional expertise in application development with **.NET**, **C#**, **ReactJS**, and cloud computing, along with a background in microservices architecture and distributed systems using **Apache Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Redis**. Committed to delivering high-quality, compliant solutions while optimizing workflows and streamlining processes.

Utilized analytical tools for data-driven decision-making and reporting, helping to identify and implement performance improvements in manufacturing processes.
